Module kivakit.settings.stores.zookeeper

Package com.telenav.kivakit.settings.stores.zookeeper

package com.telenav.kivakit.settings.stores.zookeeper
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ZookeeperChangeListener
    Methods that are called when Zookeeper data is created, changes or is deleted.
    ZookeeperConnection.ListenerMethod
    Functional interface to ZookeeperChangeListener methods
    ZookeeperConnectionListener
    Methods that are called when Zookeeper data is created, changes or is deleted.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ZookeeperConnection
    Maintains a connection to zookeeper and performs operations using that connection
    ZookeeperConnection.Settings
    Settings for this Zookeeper connection
    ZookeeperSettingsStore
    A SettingsStore that uses Apache Zookeeper to load and save settings objects so they can be easily accessed in a clustered environment.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum
    Description
    ZookeeperConnection.State
    State of this settings store
